0110101101100110 0011111100010001 1 -> sum: 1010101001111000, cout: 0

1100000001011001 0011110101100111 1 -> sum: 1111110111000001, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
